articles.author: Washington Examiner
articles.title: WATCH: Feinstein’s death begs the question: Are Trump and Biden too old for office?
articles.description: ANAHEIM, California — Sen. Dianne Feinstein (D-CA), who just died at the age of 90, faced pressure to step down from her position over questions about her health and ability to serve, putting the issue of aging politicians front and center. The Washington Examiner asked people at the California GOP convention if age is playing any factor in their presidential decision.

articles.title: Hasan Minhaj ‘lies’: Would America care if he wasn’t a minority?
articles.description: Having spent several years in the US as a student during the Donald Trump presidency, I know it’s not easy to have a discussion on identity.
